mapper.select: select job_id,title,content, date_format(create_user_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date,status, date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end_time ,date_format(create_user_date,'%m-%d') create_date_show from cahg_job WHERE status in (0,1) ORDER BY create_date DESC limit 0,6
select title,content, date_format(create_user_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date,file_name, date_format(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end_time, status from cahg_job c where job_id = #{job_id}
select d.*,u.username, j.`status` from cahg_job_detail d, sys_user u , cahg_job j where d.job_id = #{job_id} and d.create_user_id = u.user_id and j.job_id = d.job_id
mapper.insert: insert into cahg_job_result ( job_id, user_name, dept_id, content, create_time ) values( #{jobId}, #{userName}, #{deptId}, #{content}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: update cahg_job set status = #{status} where job_id = #{jobId}
